author: ghudson
msg: Rev the svn_hash_read and svn_hash_write APIs, and add new APIs to
(svn_hash_read2, svn_hash_write2): New revs of the hash APIs.  the
new APIs accept streams instead of files, and accept a variable
terminator.  svn_hash_read2 is more restrictive than svn_hash_read;
it does not accept empty files as an empty hash if a terminator is
given, and it cannot be told to accept both "END" and "PROPS-END".
functions to read and write hashes incrementally relative to
(hash_read, hash_write): Utility functions to implement the new
(svn_hash_read): Preserve old implementation, since it's quirky.

author: djh
msg: Fix Win32 project generator when swig is not found.
(WinGeneratorBase._find_swig): If swig was not found then setup an
empty self.swig_libdir so the projects can still be generated.

author: breser
msg: Update neon refs, s/0.24.5/0.24.6/, to fix sscanf bug in neon.
